Thu Dec 28 03:01:36 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/bin
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/wget-1.21.4/bin/wget /opt/bin//wget
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share

ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/etc
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/etc//wgetrc /opt/package/wget-1.21.4/etc/wgetrc
